text: Bothwell Bridge Lido is a lido on the south-west side of Bothwell Bridge in Hamilton, South Lanarkshire, Scotland. The lido is unique with the water being the River Clyde. It also has Victorian-style gardens named "Lido Gardens". This is easiest to see from the Clyde Walkway and NCR 74. ==See also== *History of lidos in the United Kingdom ==References== Category:Lidos Category:Swimming venues in Scotland Category:River Clyde Category:Hamilton, South Lanarkshire
